title: Basic instructions to a cab driver
context: Tell your taxi driver nicely to take you to a specific street address.

content.bestLine: Take me to 123 Main Street, please.

neutral.text: I need to go to 123 Main Street.
Please drive me to this location.
Can you take me to this street address?
I'd like to go to 123 Main Street, please.
Take me to 123 Main Street, thanks.

informal.text: Hey, can you take me to 123 Main?
Take me to Main Street, okay?
Just take me to 123 Main, please.
Can you drop me off at 123 Main?
Take me to 123 Main, I'd appreciate it.
I need a ride to 123 Main Street.

formal.text: I would like to go to 123 Main Street, please.
My destination is 123 Main Street, thank you.
Could you please take me to 123 Main Street?
I am headed to 123 Main Street, if you please.
Take me to 123 Main Street, if you would.
I would appreciate it if you could take me to 123 Main Street.

patterns.meaning: requesting a ride to a specific location
stating a need to travel to a specific location

dialogs.description: Giving instructions to a cab driver

lines.speaker: Passenger
lines.text: Take me to 123 Main Street, please.

lines.speaker: Driver
lines.text: Okay, that's just a few blocks away.

lines.speaker: Passenger
lines.text: Can you take me to 123 Main Street?

lines.speaker: Driver
lines.text: Yes, I can take you there. It'll be about a 10-minute drive.
